ComicInfo.Summary: Enter: The Bug-Riders. In the aftermath of an alien invasion, Martian enlarging rays have unleashed a horde of super-sized insects on our periled planet and the Savage Dragon is our only hope to save this ravaged world from complete annihilation! But can he stop their infestation without destroying the new order that's keeping a strange new society alive? Questions are answered and secrets are revealed in this adventure.
